Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

Having the soldier Domingos Vicente, of the squadron under my command, presented himself at the barracks with a shaved mustache, and considering the conduct of this soldier not only as an act of insubordination but also some sedition by a hidden person, I arrested him and ordered him to be confined in the prisons of the 8th Battalion by order of Your Excellency

Your Excellency

God keep Your Lordship Barracks of the Squadron of Barra, August 30, 1837.  
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir  
Francisco Xavier da Cunha
